title: Personal Portfolio
description: A modern, responsive portfolio site highlighting my projects and experience, featuring a dynamic S3 configuration. Designed for scalability, accessibility, and high performance.

title: Cloud Commerce
description: A scalable e-commerce platform built with a serverless architecture, designed to handle high traffic and deliver a fast, seamless shopping experience. It features optimized content delivery, secure user authentication, a responsive mobile first design, and a streamlined shopping cart.
